title: Finding the Missing Factor
text: Find the missing factor in the denominators that would give them the given LCD (least common denominator.)

title: Multiplying each Expression
text: Multiply each denominator by the 'missing' factor and multiply each numerator by the same factor.

title: Simplifying the Numerator
text: Simplify the numerators by multiplying out their factors. For example, $$6\left(a+3\right)$$ $$=$$ 6a + $$18$$.
